name: Valleys Nightrider (south Wales)
description:
VALLEYS NIGHTRIDER Unlimited evening travel after 18:30 on Transport for Wales services around Cardiff and the Welsh Valley lines to Maesteg, Treherbert, Aberdare, Merthyr Tydfil, Coryton, Rhymney 
      and Ebbw Vale and to Barry Island and over the Vale of Neath line. It is also valid on the main line between Cardiff and Bridgend but not on GWR services. It is also valid on the first train back to the original station the following morning and is also valid on all "Stagecoach South Wales" buses and on "Thomas of Rhondda" buses.
